meanings.sent1: The lingulate leaf was long and narrow.
meanings.sent2: The lingulate flower petals were pointed at the tip.
meanings.sent3: The lingulate cloud resembled a giant tongue in the sky.
meanings.sent4: The lingulate shadow cast by the tree looked like a stretched-out tongue.
meanings.sent5: The lingulate shape of the boat's hull made it glide smoothly through the water.

meanings.sent1: The lingulate seashell had a curved extension at one end.
meanings.sent2: The lingulate ornament on the necklace added a unique touch.
meanings.sent3: The lingulate keychain looked like a tiny tongue hanging from the bag.
meanings.sent4: The lingulate tail of the lizard wiggled playfully as it moved.
meanings.sent5: The lingulate design on the handle of the sword gave it an elegant look.
